author: Filmento
description:
James Gunn's Superman is here to reboot the DC universe, which is bad news for all those who aren't his wife or friends, including Zack Snyder's Man of Steel. But which movie is better? Let's compare and find out the definitive answer.

Superman (2025)
Superman, David Corenswet, recovers from his first loss in battle with the help of Krypto in the Fortress of Solitude.
title: Why Superman Works & Fails where Man of Steel Didn't | One v One
